Trade/Device Name(s): BGM039 Link Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BGM039 Blood Glucose Monitoring System and BGM039 Link Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing to quantitatively measure glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips, forearm, or palm by people with diabetes at home as an aid in monitoring effectiveness of diabetes control; not indicated for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
